changelog:
### Iconify v6.3.0 has arrived! It has the following new changes:

## Feature Changes:
- __Internal:__
    - Updated JNI libraries
    - Bump compile SDK and target SDK
    - Added support for x86 and x86_64 devices
- __UI Roundness:__
    - Allow minimum roundness value to be 0
- __Color Engine:__
    - Added back Pitch Black Amoled mode
    - Fixed pitch black not applying automatically
- __Miscellaneous:__
    - Added Tablet Landscape AKA Better QS
    - Added Tablet Header to disable QPR2 clock
    - Added Accent Privacy Chip
    - Added Notch Bar Killer QS tile
- __XPosed Menu:__
    - Fixed Fluid QS Theme for LOS based roms
    - Allow disabling Fluid Theme notification transparency
    - Added 2 new Battery Style
    - Fixed Battery Style for more roms
    - Fixed Header Image not applying instantly
    - Added 3 new Header Clocks
    - Fixed Header Clocks for A13 QPR3
    - Added Header Clock custom font
    - Added Header Clock custom color
    - Allow hiding Header Clock in landscape mode
    - Added 3 new Lockscreen Clocks
    - Fixed Lockscreen Clocks for A13 QPR3
    - Fixed Lockscreen Clock time delay
    - Added Lockscreen Clock custom color
    - Allow hiding clock on incoming notification
    - Added a new Background Chip style
    - Added option to change statusbar clock color
    - Fixed hiding carrier and status icons for A13 QPR3
- __Settings:__
    - Added custom app icon
    - Added cache cleaner

## Translation Credits:
- French @MXC48
- Indonesian @KaeruShi
- Persian @Faceless1999

- Russian @B1ays

## Feature Credits:
- Thanks to @itsHanibee & TeamFiles for BetterQS module
- Thanks to @modestCat03 for LS Clock time delay fix
- Also thanks to all the contributors

Also included in this version are bug fixes and other improvements.
